name: Turmeric Rice
recipeIngredient: 2 sprigs fresh thyme or 1/4 teaspoon dried
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of the butter in a saucepan and add the onion and garlic. Cook, stirring, until the onion is wilted. Add the rice, turmeric, parsley, thyme, Tabasco, bay leaf, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, stirring. Cover and simmer 17 minutes.
Discard the parsley and thyme sprigs and bay leaf. Add the remaining butter and toss the rice with a fork.
